title: Boy Scout 1967 Type
content:
I am interested in ID-ing the typeface (or, better, its modern font equivalent) for both the bold caps sans-serif and the body text sans-serif used in this cool 1967 boyscout "Camp Tenderfoot Scoreboard." Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [type-specimen.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725051345/http:/typophile.com/files/type-specimen.JPG) | 211.03 KB |
author: Neaner1425

comments.content:
Futura? [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725051345/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/")  
But the a is wrong. Have to check Intertype Vogue and a few others.  
Don
a is right for Vogue Sans

Tail on \_g\_ is too short for Futura, but fits Vogue Sans. But other Letters in Vogue Sans like \_C\_ and \_M\_ don't fit ... a 1967 puzzle.  
Don
